recipes.label: Memory?
recipes.startdescription: I begin to remember- fragments of my old life. Somehow, I find the strength to continue.
recipes.desc: At last, the light of a hurricane lamp bobbing in the dark. As it approaches, a face looms out of the night.

recipes.label: Determination?
recipes.startdescription: I carry great inner strength. I refuse to stop here. I press on.
recipes.desc: At last, the light of a hurricane lamp bobbing in the dark. As it approaches, a face looms out of the night.

recipes.label: Light?
recipes.startdescription: Inner light is usually to be guarded. But perhaps, if I let it shine, I could attract attention.
recipes.desc: At last, the light of a hurricane lamp bobbing in the dark. As it approaches, a face looms out of the night.

recipes.label: Pride?
recipes.startdescription: Is this it? To end, so mundanely- it will not do.
recipes.desc: With my remaining strength- a primal scream. Then a pause. At last, the light of a hurricane lamp bobbing in the dark. As it approaches, a face looms out of the night.

recipes.label: Yearning?
recipes.startdescription: That old yearning stirs within me once more.
recipes.desc: Something shifts, just outside of view- slowly, I crawl towards it. At last, the light of a hurricane lamp bobbing in the dark. As it approaches, a face looms out of the night.

recipes.label: Strength?
recipes.startdescription: My body is not done, not yet.
recipes.desc: At last, the light of a hurricane lamp bobbing in the dark. As it approaches, a face looms out of the night.
